00036 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 //  Report ids (kernel)
00038 //
00039 //  Report ids in the range of 500-599.
00040 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 
00042 #ifndef SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE
00043 #define SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE(id,unused1,unused2) \
00044     namespace sc_core { extern SC_API const char id[]; }
00045 namespace sc_core {
00046     extern SC_API const char SC_ID_REGISTER_ID_FAILED_[]; // in sc_report_handler.cpp
00047 }
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE(SC_ID_NO_BOOL_RETURNED_            , 500, 
00051         "operator does not return boolean")
00052 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE(SC_ID_NO_INT_RETURNED_             , 501,
00053         "operator does not return int")

00059         "operand is not bool")
